channel.title: Auto Flooder version 1.1 OUT! Thanks to XxKanexX!
channel.description:
This script will flood you/your victim with multiple pages every moment. Over 500 lines of pure flooding. Also a warning to keep idiots from running the script lol. I may make one that goes to wowomg and swollentip if anyone really wants it, but that'd be mean to your victim. I only play fun pranks ;) Don't expect this script to win a medal or find a cure for cancer, it's only my second script (3rd if you count the updates to my Age In Seconds script). Here it is, version 1.1!!!: [scar]{.Script Info: # ScriptName = Auto Flooder # Author = Zeh Progage # Description = This is for pranking a friend or for learning more about your computer. # Version = 1.1 # Date = December, 10, 2006 # Comments = This thing can tell you if your computer sucks or not;] /Script Info} program WindowFlooder; var i: Integer; begin // Updated with XxKanexX's help, now using a variable instead of 500 copied and pasted lines. // This script doesn't have websites in it so your victim doesn't get in trouble. // Hopefully you don't mess up someone's computer with this script.. too much;] writeln('Welcome to the autoflooder!') wait(5000) writeln('Stop this script NOW if you were given this as an autocutter, fisher, etc.') wait(5000) writeln('Get ready for the biggest flood of your life! :O') wait(10000) for i := 1 to 500 do begin OpenWebPage('http://www.runescape.com'); Wait(100); end; writeln('If you''re still alive after this, congradulate yourself.') wait(100) writeln('and thank whoever got you your computer for getting one that works!')
end.[/scar]

item.title: Auto Flooder version 1.1 OUT! Thanks to XxKanexX!
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

gokon:

this is useless. every time you try to open a web page with the openwebpage command, it asks the person running the script if they want to allow access. so as long as the person denies all 500, its just annoying and does nothing

But it’s still annoying.

Read full topic

item.title: Auto Flooder version 1.1 OUT! Thanks to XxKanexX!
item.dc:creator: @Zeh_Progage Zeh Progage
item.description:
@Zeh_Progage wrote:

[quote=“XxKanexX, post:2, topic:35441”]You could do something like:

var i: Integer;
begin
  for i:= 1 to 500 do
  begin
    OpenWebPage('http://www.runescape.com');
    Wait(100);
  end;
end.

That will open the Runescape site 500 times… Instead of having to copy and paste 500 lines of coding.

Basically it just repeats, counting with the “i” integer 500 times, whatever code is inbetween begin and end;[/quote]
Thanks! I’ll update this now You’re my hero

Read full topic

item.title: Auto Flooder version 1.1 OUT! Thanks to XxKanexX!
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

You could do something like:

var i: Integer;
begin
  for i:= 1 to 500 do
  begin
    OpenWebPage('http://www.runescape.com');
    Wait(100);
  end;
end.

That will open the Runescape site 500 times… Instead of having to copy and paste 500 lines of coding.

Basically it just repeats, counting with the “i” integer 500 times, whatever code is inbetween begin and end;

Read full topic

item.title: Auto Flooder version 1.1 OUT! Thanks to XxKanexX!
item.dc:creator: @Zeh_Progage Zeh Progage
item.description:
@Zeh_Progage wrote:

This script will flood you/your victim with multiple pages every moment. Over 500 lines of pure flooding. Also a warning to keep idiots from running the script lol.
I may make one that goes to wowomg and swollentip if anyone really wants it, but that’d be mean to your victim. I only play fun pranks Don’t expect this script to win a medal or find a cure for cancer, it’s only my second script (3rd if you count the updates to my Age In Seconds script).
Here it is, version 1.1!!!:
[scar]{.Script Info:

ScriptName = Auto Flooder

Author = Zeh Progage

Description = This is for pranking a friend or for learning more about your computer.

Version = 1.1

Date = December, 10, 2006

Comments = This thing can tell you if your computer sucks or not;]

/Script Info}
program WindowFlooder;
var i: Integer;
begin
// Updated with XxKanexX’s help, now using a variable instead of 500 copied and pasted lines.
// This script doesn’t have websites in it so your victim doesn’t get in trouble.
// Hopefully you don’t mess up someone’s computer with this script… too much;]
writeln(‘Welcome to the autoflooder!’)
wait(5000)
writeln(‘Stop this script NOW if you were given this as an autocutter, fisher, etc.’)
wait(5000)
writeln(‘Get ready for the biggest flood of your life! :O’)
wait(10000)
for i := 1 to 500 do
begin
OpenWebPage(‘http://www.runescape.com’);
Wait(100);
end;
writeln(‘If you’‘re still alive after this, congradulate yourself.’)
wait(100)
writeln(‘and thank whoever got you your computer for getting one that works!’)

end.[/scar]

Read full topic
